nvtop
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which nvtop installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using nvtop, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load nvtop/1.2.1-GCCcore-10.3.0
```
